  • Method Details

    • chatName

      public String chatName()
      Returns the name of the chat.
      Returns:
      A String containing the name of the chat.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(String message)
      Sends a message to the chat.
      Parameters:
      String - message - The message to be sent.

    • haveNewMessage

      public boolean haveNewMessage()
      Checks if there are any new messages in the chat.
      Returns:
      A Boolean value. true if there is an unread message, false otherwise.

    • getLastMessage

      public String getLastMessage()
      Retrieves the last received message from the chat.
      Returns:
      A String containing the last message received from the chat.

    • closeChat

      public void closeChat()
      Closes the current chat.

    • isActual

      public boolean isActual()
      Checks if the chat object still exists.
      Returns:
      A Boolean value. true if the chat object is still active, false otherwise.
